original: Larsson, Karl Bernhard, läroverksadjunkt, Trollhättan, f. 20/8/08 i Malmö av Per L. o. Johanna Olsson. G. 37 m. Aina Svensson. Barn: Kjell f. 39. — Stud:ex. 29, fil. kand. 32 o. fil. mag. v35, allt i Lund, provår v. Vasa h. a. 1. i Gbg 40-41. E. adj. v. Malmö gosslärov. 36-37, Hälsingborgs dito 38- 40, i Halmstad 41-42, adj. i tyska, eng. o. franska v. Trollhättans samrealsk. sed. 42, därjämte tjg. v. Malmö afton-sk., ABF i Malmö o. Trollhättan, Malmö föreläsn :fören., Hälsingborgs samlärov., kadettsk. i Ljungbyhed samt Trollhättans yrkessk. Resor t. Tyskl., Engl. o. Frankr.
translated:
Larsson, Karl Bernhard, high school teacher, Trollhättan, b. 20/8/08 in Malmö to Per L. and Johanna Olsson. Married in '37 to Aina Svensson. Children: Kjell, b. '39. 
Education: High School Diploma in '29, Bachelor of Arts in '32, and Master of Arts in Education in '35, all from Lund University. One year of teaching practice at Vasa School in Gothenburg in 1940-41. 
Employment: Assistant teacher at Malmö Boys' School in '36-37, Hälsingborg's Boys' School in '38-40, Halmstad in '41-42, and German, English, and French teacher at Trollhättan Secondary School since '42. Additionally worked at Malmö Evening School, ABF in Malmö and Trollhättan, Malmö Lecture Association, Hälsingborgs Girls' School, Cadet School in Ljungbyhed, and Trollhättan Vocational School. 
Travels to Germany, England, and France.
